text: Athanase Bala (2 March 1927 – 3 September 2019) was a Cameroonian Roman Catholic bishop. Bala was born in Cameroon and was ordained to the priesthood in 1955. He served as titular bishop of Gegi and coadjutor bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Bafia, Cameroon, from 1976 until 1977. Bala then served as bishop of the Bafia Diocese from 1977 until 2003. ==Notes== Category:1927 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Cameroonian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Athanase Bala
